original_title: Julia de Castro de la Puríssima: Anatomía de una criminal
overview: This mockumentary, directed by Javier Giner, follows Julia de Castro, cuplé singer and actress, from the musical quartet De la Puríssima, in her personal oddysey to find someone who truly appreciates her artisticv alue, reflected in a portrait painted by Oscar Tusquets
title: Julia de Castro de la Puríssima: Anatomía de una criminal
